title: Lindsey Graham Blasts Fox For Its Treatment of Trump
content:
Although be believes Democratic frontrunner Hillary Clinton would beat Donald Trump “ like a drum , ” Sen. Lindsey Graham ( R-S.C. ) blasted Fox News for its queries of Trump during Thursday ’ s GOP presidential debate .
Interviewed on MSNBC ’ s Morning Joe , Graham snapped , “ This was more of an inquisition than it was a debate . It was a missed opportunity to talk about things that really mattered. ” He lambasted debate moderators Bret Baier , Megyn Kelly , and Chris Wallace for their treatment of Trump , saying , “ At the end of the day , ask the man a question that explains his position and his solutions rather than a ten-minute question that describes him as the biggest bastard on the planet . ”
Graham bemoaned the lack of discussion of substantive issues , asserting , “ Do you really understand our position on immigration after this debate ? ”
Graham did not uniformly support Trump , indirectly criticizing him for his position on illegal immigration . He stated , “ Mexico is not making these people come here . They ’ re coming here because they want to . They live in hellholes and they want a better life. ” He added , “ The whole construct that they are sending their worst I reject , ” in reference to Trump ’ s remarks claiming many illegal immigrants are criminals whose native countries impel them to leave .
Graham said bluntly , “ Hillary Clinton would beat trump like a drum . I don ’ t think so ; I know so . ”
Last month , Graham destroyed his cell phone after Trump read the phone number aloud on national TV , then later appeared on ABC ’ s This Week and said , “ I would ask the Republican Party why most major companies are firing Mr. Trump , and I don ’ t think we should hire him . I ’ m not taking on voters , I am taking on an idea that I think he ’ s appealing to the dark side of American politics . He is not offering solutions to hard , complicated problems . He is basically selling fear and prejudice . ”
